response.overview: In the 16 mm film to you (1994) a 12-year old girl searches and stretches on a white circular  slab of Thassos marble in a field by a coastline. The girlâ€™s focus is turned inwards and on her own  movements. The slab was installed by Dolven in Sandnes, near Stavanger, in 1994. In 2018, the  artist returned to Sandnes, where she found her sculpture covered in moss, almost  unrecognisable. The pigment print of the stone is in the scale of 1:1 presented next to a video  monitor with the film of the girl from 1994. The passing of time is perceivable through nature: the  changes to the stone from 1994 to 2018 marks a temporal arc of 24 years.
response.title: to you 1994 - 2018
